txt.en: Sâri-surma is a place filled with many wights and many other strange things.  Complete the challenge, defeat all of the lieutenants, guardians, and bosses. Then and only then will your reward be great.\n\nThis deed is only completeable in the Tier 2 Legendary difficulty of this instance.
Complete the Challenge Mode for Sâri-surma (Tier 2 only)
You have completed the Challenge Mode for Sâri-surma
